reviews.review: nearly 20 years old and still holds up

"Rise and Shine M.Freeman, rise and shine"

It's surprising that I just am now beginning to play half-life 2 in 2022. If you are thinking of getting it, you should. I was missing out so much all these years. It is easily one of the best games I've ever played. The graphics were so good at the time and still hold up very well to this day. The game play does as well. I'm not sure I can say much more other than this is a fantastic game.
bought and finished this game just for barney calhoun. Gameplay 9/10, too spooky for me sometimes. uhhh story-wise idk, was only paying attention to barney

Awesome game. My first time playing was now (2022). It was a great history lesson into one of the pillars of gaming history. I was quite blown away by how the game responded to my actions. For example, I once threw a can at a guard, and they got upset and hit me! That's awesome reaction! And only made more impressive considering this game is nearly 20 years old! 

Would recommend this game to folks who enjoy story-driven FPS.
